data.description:
Softspace is an intuitive AR workspace where you lay out and organize notes, images, and websites. Connect related concepts, search the web for inspiration, and even get creative suggestions from our AI. This powerful productivity and creativity tool helps you develop the ideas at the heart of your best work.

To get started, visit → docs.soft.space/start

Features:

• Fast, intuitive UI for manipulating objects in 3D
• Work with text, images, and web bookmarks (more soon)
• Create topics to group and organize your ideas
• Built-in web browser with image-saving function
• AI-powered answers, topic suggestions, and clustering
• Import from and export to Dropbox

For more info, visit → www.soft.space

changelog.change_log:
For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.20.2

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed a bug that broke AI ideation and mindmapping function.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.20

## Improvements

- In controller mode, pressing the left controller menu button once will toggle the hand menu. Previously, the menu only displayed when the menu button was held down.
- The positioning of the palm menu is higher up, for better usage ergonomics.
- In controller mode, the cursor now has the same positioning logic as in tracked hand mode, making the selection of items higher up in the field view possible much more comfortable.

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed: Deleting a workspace was not updating the user’s global item count.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

## Bug Fixes

# Softspace v2024.18.2

## Improvements

- The tutorial has been redesigned with a cleaner UI, fewer steps, and locally-packaged videos to eliminate loading delays.
- The drag interaction now kicks in after a shorter delay, making scrolling websites and selecting text feel much snappier.

## Known Issues

- Unpairing a network keyboard does not correctly update the keyboard status.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.17

## Improvements

- Reduced app startup time.
- When user is logged out or has not yet logged in, a placeholder demo workspace is shown.
- The Palm Menu now indicated which options are available during various steps of app startup. Unavailable options are grayed out and not pressable.
- The keyboard setting are now accessible during the app sign-in step, so you can pair a network keyboard to type your login credentials.

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed bug that was causing the demo workspace to load with an incorrect display name.

## Known Issues

- Unpairing a network keyboard does not correctly update the keyboard status.
- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.16

## Improvements

- AI queries now include contextual information about other content in the workspace to improve the specificity and usefulness of responses. Continuing to improve the AI features is an ongoing effort!

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed a bug that was preventing web browsers from being activated after one had been deleted from the workspace.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.15.1

## Improvements

- Spatial computing with a physical keyboard is a completely different experience than without. We know that the vast majority of users do not have a spare Bluetooth keyboard to pair with their headset. Even those who do occasionally forget to bring the it. That’s why we’ve built the Softspace Network Keyboard: a web app that lets you use a laptop, desktop, or even iPad as a physical keyboard for text input in Softspace.
- The buttons for deleting and copying TopicItems are now easier to select and switch between without accidentally selecting UI elements behind them, because the gap between them has been closed.
- Workspaces are now associated with a specific logged-in user. Signing out of a Softspace account will remove access to those workspaces until that account is signed in again. Note: Workspaces are still only stored locally. Workspaces are not synced across devices, and deleting the Softspace app from your headset will delete all workspace data.
- More robust handling of and support for browser popup windows.

## Bug Fixes

- Settings and account management UI is prevented from appearing too far below eye-level.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.14

## Improvements

- Paused browser instances are more-subtly darkened, making them easier to view.
- Text item body text has a lighter-weight font, which is more visually.

## Bug Fixes

- Clicking on and unpausing a paused browser will now also start typing on it.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.13

## Improvements

- Popups are now properly supported, allowing for successful OAuth authentication flows into web apps such as Notion.
- Long-click on the web browser, when not hovering over a downloadable image, will initiate a click-and-drag input that allows e.g. text selection, sketching in TLDraw, group selection in Notion, and other drag interactions.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.12

This was a big one! The highlights are: multiple web browsers, much faster image loading, and more comfortable UI for improved core usability.

## Improvements

- New, one-click UI for creating Topics, web browsers, and AI queries.
- Browser instances are now independent Items in the workspace, Therefore, multiple browsers are possible, but only one is “active” at a time to maintain smooth framerates.
- New image processing library is 10-100x faster than previous implementation.
- Added safeguards against accidental gripping and clicking by hands outside field-of-view.
- Re-introduced positional snapping and overlap prevention for anchored Items in workspace.
- Removed automatic Item scaling (previously introduced) to prevent visual overlap of Items.
- Added an indicator UI at the bottom of the field-of-view that shows date and time, network status, and keyboard status.
- Added a “copy” button to Topics that copies contents as Markdown to the clipboard.
- Changed the font of Text items to be more writing-friendly.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.11

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed a bug that would cause expanded topics to display the incorrect backing size when the title was edited.
- Fixed a bug that could cause multiple items to be typed on at the same time.
- Reverted a setting that was preventing popup-style links (e.g. links out from the Gmail web app) from loading.
- Fixed issue that was causing newly-selected text fields on websites to stop being selected, preventing the user from typing in them.

## Improvements

- Reduced the pixel density of rendered web content to improve browsing performance and avoid periods of dropped frames.
- Reduced animations in topic items and their children to make typing more responsive.
- The entire topic backing is now clickable, which will trigger typing.
- Arrow keys can now be used to move the typing caret from a topic header to body text and back, reducing friction of text editing.
- Reduced accidental inputs from tracked hands while typing.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Initial loading of images (e.g. saved from web, from Dropbox) can cause frame drops.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Images load in one at a time, so large numbers of images can take a while to load.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.10

## Bug Fixes

- Previous update broke website bookmarks. This update implemented a new design for website bookmarks with more metadata and better legibility.
- AI queries were being created in a collapsed state, hiding their contents. Queries are now created in an expanded state.

## Improvements

- Browser URL field now immediately updates when navigating to new page.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Initial loading of images (e.g. saved from web, from Dropbox) can cause frame drops.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Images load in one at a time, so large numbers of images can take a while to load.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.09

## Improvements

- Refreshed virtual keyboard design for improved visibility and key press reliability.
- Virtual keyboard now continuously places itself in an ergonomic position relative to the user and the typing target, unless the user’s hands are detected nearby.
- Improved virtual key collision detection to reduce failed key presses.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- Virtual keyboard audio feedback occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Initial loading of images (e.g. saved from web, from Dropbox) can cause frame drops.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Images load in one at a time, so large numbers of images can take a while to load.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.

For complete release notes, please visit → docs.soft.space

# Softspace v2024.08

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue that was causing audio echo when using speech-to-text.
- Trying to use speech-to-text while offline will trigger a warning notification.
- Speech-to-text feature now adds a leading space in front of transcribed text, and text is now correctly capitalized.
- Virtual keyboard now properly deactivates if the browser is deactivated while typing in the browser URL field.

## Improvements

- Speech-to-text button is now in a more ergonomic position in the virtual keyboard.
- Improved the visual design of the speech-to-text button.

## Known Issues

- Speech-to-text button occasionally stops working, requiring an app restart.
- AI-features sometimes take a long time to load—we’re looking into faster APIs.
- Initial loading of images (e.g. saved from web, from Dropbox) can cause frame drops.
- Workspaces with large numbers of content items can cause low framerates.
- Images load in one at a time, so large numbers of images can take a while to load.
- Browsing websites with heavy scripts or 3D rendering can cause frame drops.
